section.p: You stand firm, resolute in your faith. The phantom figure shrinks back, cowed by your divine power.
‘I only seek to perform my allotted task, for am I not the Sentinel of the Empire?’ it moans, suddenly contrite under your divinely inspired gaze.
‘The Shadar empire sank beneath the seas of time a thousand years ago, and you should have gone with it,’ you reply.
The phantom seems to hesitate, and then says, ‘I see that it is true. Perhaps, at last, I can rest.’
With that, it fades away with a ghostly wail. Instantly, the cold, green flames wink out, and you are left alone in the ruined tower.

Amid the debris you find an old banner, emblazoned with a golden sun, and a green gem worth 100 Shards. and note the
, and on your Adventure Sheet.
You go back the way you came. .
